thread.title: VIDEO: Anushka Sharma Speaks To A Reporter’s Mother In The Middle Of An Interview
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Anushka Sharma Speaks To A Reporter’s Mother In The Middle Of An Interview

author: Priyam Saha
title: VIDEO: Anushka Sharma Speaks To A Reporter’s Mother In The Middle Of An Interview
text:
Priyam Saha Mar . 8 . 2017 Anushka Sharma 
Anushka Sharma is a cool cat. She’s always so chilled out and delightful to be around. During her promotional rounds for Philauri , during her interview a reporter’s phone rang. What did Anushka do? She answered the phone, of course! Check it out:
